function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The use of Bluetooth and GPS location data for contact tracing and monitoring may raise privacy concerns.","Impact":"Potential invasion of user privacy and data security breaches.","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption and anonymization techniques, and obtain user consent for data collection.","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization, user consent management systems.","People":"App users, general public.","Owner":"Government, developers, data security experts."},{"Description":"Potential spread of misinformation and false self-diagnosis through the app.","Impact":"Increased confusion and anxiety among users, leading to unnecessary panic and strain on healthcare resources.","Mitigation":"Implement verification processes for information and self-diagnosis results, and provide clear guidelines for users.","Technologies":"Verification algorithms, information validation systems.","People":"App users, general public, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Government, developers, healthcare professionals."},{"Description":"Dependence on the accuracy of user-provided information for contact tracing and monitoring.","Impact":"Inaccurate tracing and monitoring of COVID-19 cases, leading to potential spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Implement validation mechanisms for user-provided information, and integrate with official healthcare databases.","Technologies":"Data validation systems, database integration.","People":"App users, general public, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Government, developers, healthcare professionals."}]}
